lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I care to spread the capitalist spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I fly people all around the continental United States. I feel I bring people closr to their families and businesses and that makes me happy.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to make opportunities available for those who wish to pursue their dreams!

lender.name: Shades
lender.loan_because: I figure the womens will go crazy for me now that I'm a philanthropist.
lender.occupational_info: I buy, sell and trade used and rare books.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Its fun!
lender.occupational_info: I work as an acupuncturist, in a spa, on different cruise ships around the world.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I help people to make decisions about what products to use when building their homes, and recommend products that are environmentally sustainable and non-toxic.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: I love to help for it is the true happiness I can have.
lender.occupational_info: Executing a web site to help people preserve lasting memories

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: i can :)

lender.name: Harker
lender.loan_because: We all should help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help educational institutions change their teaching and learning styles to help today's youth be tomorrow's content creators.

lender.name: KMess44
lender.loan_because: I have seen the difference a relatively small loan can make in raising people out of poverty.

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: I think KIVA has it right. Give people a vested interest in what they do and it makes a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: buy and sell stocks

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: I support globalization, free trade, capitalism and hard work.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Good fortune has a lot to do with success, together with hard work and perseverance. Getting a hand up at the right time helped me, and might help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to understand why people get cancer and how eating the right kind of food can prevent or cure their cancer.

lender.name: Jijesh & Colleen
lender.loan_because: Colleen and I are very fortunate to have a good life. Further, we believe entrepreneurship is the most effective tool to fight poverty, and we are aspiring entrepreneurs ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Colleen is a very creative packaged foods Product developer for a Fortune 100 company, and Jijesh goes to school for his PhD in Management.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work on sustainable energy projects.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: My friend gave me a Kiva gift for Christmas
lender.occupational_info: In retirement I am daring to be creative. I'm currently working on art quilts.

lender.name: Veronica E.
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful feeling to assist others in achieving their goals.
lender.occupational_info:
I am working on my doctorate in sociology-- the study of society and its social structures, institutions, and processes.
Although my research focuses on my own country (the US), sociology has helped me to realize that we are all interconnected across the globe.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: Give a person a fish, feed him for a day - teach a person to fish, feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My Grandma gave this opportunity to me for Christmas as a gift

lender.name: The Hands & Gresham
lender.occupation: Believers in Jesus-the Power to change the world.
lender.loan_because:
Let your light shine before men that they may see your good deeds & praise your Father in Heaven...So in everything, do for others what you would have them do for you. Matt 5:16 & 7:12
Every good thing bestowed is from above...James 1:17
In memory of George S. Sr. & Madaline Hand
lender.occupational_info: Back, L-R Judith & George- retired College Professors/Administrators, Emily-Dance Instructor, Cathy Gresham-Doctor; Front L-R Greg-Computer Specialist, Tobie-Interior Designer; Boys-growing angels

lender.name: Jolinda
lender.loan_because: I feel that I don't just make a difference in one family. My loan helps to change the whole community.

lender.name: Jasmin
lender.loan_because: I want to play with everybody in the world some day.
lender.occupational_info: 2 parts milk, 1 part sleep and 100 parts LOVE and KINDNESS!

lender.name: jessie
lender.loan_because: i believe in think globally, act locally
lender.occupational_info: i listen to problems then sell solutions, it involves a lot of communication

lender.name: Carrie-Leigh
lender.loan_because: I want to see first hand where my money is going. I do support various charities although I become disgruntled with the fact that your money is potentially going on administration. Kiva gives me the chance to put 100% of my money into the hands of someone that needs it and THEN dontate to Kiva themselves to support their overheads. I like that vibe :)
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office making sure the day to day adminstration and staff run smoothly and effectively. I keep the internal systems ticking over and staff morale as high as I can. I am involved in technology and human resources also.

lender.name: Barb
lender.occupational_info: I work with managers and leaders in organizations who want to be more strategic in their work, better at leading change initiatives, and stronger at developing people.

lender.name: Mallory
lender.loan_because: I want to help others find their inner entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: As the most amazing group of people I've ever met.

lender.name: Sipha
lender.loan_because: I believe that human motivation is an amazing engine. They have the motivation and I want to see their achievement. Then one day, they will also be able to loan to someone else :-)

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I want to support those who lack the privileges I've had in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help neurologists run clinical research trials. I want to become a research neuroscientist someday.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help young adults develop the skills they need to find meaningful employment.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love helping people who want to help themselves. I get excited knowing I can make a diffence in another persons life and that will have a ripple effect.
lender.occupational_info: I have retired because of health reasons but I keep myself busy fundraising and volunteering.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: From two trips to Cambodia I have seen the need first hand, and I understand how much as little as a $250 loan means to someone there, and I want to help with a hand up rather than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use and resolve problems with SAP R/3 ECC6 payroll and financial accounting.

lender.name: D, M, O & J
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped us succeed. We hope to pay it forward.

lender.name: sam
lender.loan_because: I can! If everyone who could loan to Kiva did we would improve so many lives. I love to know I'm helping someone improve thier life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 15. I like to say I'm a photographer but I really just watch peoples dogs.

lender.name: Shantih
lender.loan_because: I want to help others as I have been helped by so many.

lender.name: Tony and Norma
lender.loan_because: I hope our leading helps improve the lives and standard of living of people in need. I am also ashamed of my government ,through the IMF and World Bank, having a tradition of exploiting the governments and people of underdeveloped countries for the financial interests of the multinational corporations
lender.occupational_info: Tony is a physical therapist who works to rehabilitate injured and disabled people. Norma is a teacher of English and History and volunteers her time teaching English to hispanic immigrants

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: computer related

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the development and validation of immunoassays.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: This was a holiday gift to my team. We made a commitment to continue to loan this money in perpetuity to enrich the lives of others less fortunate.

lender.name: Fred
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I use images to understand how the human body works. She studies the brain. I study the foot and the lungs. We each try to learn how diseases happen.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: it's great to help other people. And this world needs more "givers".

lender.name: Doug
lender.occupational_info: I make peoples money work for them....

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans are an excellent way to help people remove themselves from poverty and provide for themselves.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I feel incredibly fortunate for all that I have -- Kiva gives me a venue to share with people all over the world in ways that actually make a difference.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to make an impact and to feel involved in the world community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time mom of 1 and 3 year old daughters.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupational_info: plan corporate events & communicate within a corporate department

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I've traveled extensively by motorcycle throughout Mexico and Central America and have seen the desire of people everywhere to improve their lives. I want to help them achieve that goal.
lender.occupational_info: Manager of a database, reporting, and analytics team. We retrieve data and present it to others in a way that helps them make better decisions.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to share with other hard working people to help them fulfill their dreams and support their families. I have been fortunate in my life to have supportive people along my journey and I wish to pay it forward! Best wishes!
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies in running their businesses more efficiently and becoming more profitable doing more with less effort.

lender.name: LMG Communications Team
lender.loan_because: We loan because it's one way that we can use our resources to make a difference. Everyone deserves a chance to create a good life for themselves.

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: If you can help, you should.

lender.name: Mannino
lender.loan_because: I like it a lot

lender.name: Ruth
lender.occupation: RDI therapist - working with autistic kids

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: These people are the hope and the light of the world!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fighting chance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, and not just in school.

lender.name: Bennett
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible!
lender.occupational_info: I work with amazing people doing incredible work to help people improve their lives.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: accountant

lender.name: Tyson
lender.loan_because: I want others to have just as much of a chance to succeed as I do.

lender.name: Raskel
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to make dreams come true :-)
lender.occupational_info: I love Pets, My business is keeping them safe at home.....

lender.name: Global Issues P2
lender.loan_because: We have studied the issue of extreme poverty throughout the developing world, and have recognized the power of micro-credit institutions to help empower people, and get them onto the ladder of economic growth
lender.occupational_info: We are juniors in high school in Wilsonville, OR

lender.name: Mike & Lisa
lender.loan_because: Microlending is ingenious, and we want to do our small part to help through this incredible mechanism.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone is put on this earth to do great things. Sometimes all it takes is to give someone a helping hand, so they too can pass it on...
lender.occupational_info:
What I do is help other people look and feel better about themselves by helping deep clean and soften their skin. This will help make your skin care products work 70% better than before. Our scientists have actually found the enzyne that causes the cells to age and is the only company to manufacture a product, coming soon, to stop you from aging.
Over 100 million meals have been donated by our caring associates and company matches to not just feed, but nourish children all over the world. Be a part of this now by going to my Website click on the link below.
I also help others start there own worldwide anti-aging business, which the difference can be demonstrated and guaranteed or your money back. We are in 48 or more country, so we need your help TODAY!

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to make positive change in their life.
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of people who cannot care for themselves.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.occupational_info: I help high school students to get their diploma. I also give guidance on personal, career and academic issues.

lender.name: Kim Rose
lender.loan_because:
I come from a country of ridiculous abundance, even during an economic crisis. A few years ago over the holidays, I discovered KIVA. Rather than once again succumbing to the frenzy of mindless holiday shopping, I instead chose to give my loved ones the "gift" of the KIVA experience: what it "feels" like when you contribute to someone else's life and dreams.
Pay it forward, as we are a global community now, and make a difference once person at a time.
Thanks KIVA folks, for the great idea, and the great feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently the Director of Finance, Operations, and Human Resources for an award-winning boutique Public Relations firm, splitting my time between Los Angeles and Washington D.C. I am also an independent business management consultant.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: 'Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength and with all your mind'; and, 'Love your neighbor as yourself.'
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chef in a large, upscale hotel. I am part of a team that cooks for the resteraunt as well as large parties.

lender.name: RauLilyTaviTami
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and fortunate to have the opportunity to help.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer networks.

lender.name: Barrett McLaughlin
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help. Including me.
lender.occupational_info: I do all kinds of odd jobs in the world of comedy.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: ......because I can and for that I am grateful.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest for their dreams.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe...

lender.name: Mallory
lender.loan_because: There have been times I've thought I wouldn't make it, but somebody has always been there to help me out financially. You best help yourself by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I write romance, poetry, and educational articles.

lender.name: Rudolf the Red
lender.loan_because: I have the extra money right now.
lender.occupational_info: I find property lines for government roads.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because:
Everyone deserves a chance.
Todos merecen una oportunidad.

lender.name: Vince & Julia
lender.loan_because: We want to see people realize their ambitions and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We are both University students in our mid-20s studying Geography. Vince is minoring in Math; Julia is minoring in Psychology. We both plan on becoming teachers. In order to pay for school, we are both working as bartenders in a restaurant.

lender.name: AP Econ
lender.loan_because: We have been studying poverty in class, and have learned about the positive impact micro-credit institutions can have on individuals and communities
lender.occupational_info: We are juniors and seniors in high school

lender.name: Son
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Look at eyeballs all day ;)

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: We all feel that those world problems are too big for one person to solve, well KIVA showed me that I can make an impact!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank and my job is to decide who to lend money to for buying homes, cars and all sorts of other things.

lender.name: Gina Yi
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. I am extremely blessed with everything that I have and I want to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying for the CPA exam.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to succeed if they work hard in life!

lender.name: William
lender.occupation: Computer Guru, Art and Animation Student

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Ubuntu - meaning "I am because we are"
lender.occupational_info: organic

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I know that what I have can make a much bigger difference in someone else's life than it can in mine.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of very sick children

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: After traveling for 8 months in SE Asia I want to help to foster the entrepreneurial spirit that I saw firsthand.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: We should be judged on what we give, not what we have.
lender.occupational_info: I help families plan for their retirement, provide insurance protection, help them save for college for their kids, and map out their future using financial tools.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a bit of a hand to improve their lives. People have helped me, and it is my turn to do the same.

lender.name: Robert J
lender.loan_because: I want to leave the world better than I found it
lender.occupational_info: I am a Graduate Assistant at Northern Illinois University in the Biological Sciences department.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: So far, I loan because someone was wonderful enough to gift the opportunity to.

lender.name: V.VELU
lender.loan_because: Iam poor medical student, Iam in final year, there is a financial problem, to overcome that iam doing online business, i want to upgrade membership, i return money in 45 days
lender.occupational_info: paid to read programme, iam doing this work more than 6 months, i want to upgrade my membership kindly help me

lender.name: Katie G
lender.loan_because: it's such a small thing and it seems to make a difference

lender.name: Jeremiah
lender.loan_because:
It's an easy way to make a positive impact in the world.
It also helps you to save up money while you're loaning it out. You can't spend it until it's repaid, therefore you're 'saving' it.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get "the seed money".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a married mother with 3 children. I mostly work in direct sales. I just like helping people. We should do more to help others, here or there.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: 100% goes to the entrepreneur. And because I trust Kiva. Outstanding organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital trying to find ways to save them money by keeping supply chain and service expenses low. I manage & negotiate these types of contracts for the hospital.

lender.name: Mr. Long
lender.loan_because: We wanted to help others, one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach sixth grade. My sixth graders are very enthusiastic about helping to make our world a better place, so we are trying to do whatever we can.

lender.name: Ruth & Trevor
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a worthwhile enterprise. As a retired ex small business owner I understand the difficulties at times with cash flow. I have been using profits from the Ebay sale of my collection of novels and stamps which were part of a bequest to fund my donations.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: When I struggled to make a life change, others lent me a hand. Now I am lucky to have the opportunity to do the same for someone else. If everyone were to share, there would be enough for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I travel to different schools and work with children of all ages. I work mostly with children that have disabilities, emotional problems or difficulty learning.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a little bit better

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I think it is a superb way to support peoples entrepreneurial endeavors and allow them to create their own better future
lender.occupational_info: I am making sure that the non-for-profit I work for implements all its actions to achieve a maximum impact to support the improvement of this world

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I have a reasonable loan to pay for my home; I'm hopeful to be helping people who wouldn't otherwise be able to obtain such loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work on software.

lender.name: Carlijn
lender.loan_because: I have great admiration for all the men and ladies who take the intiative and work hard to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their customers!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Dutch government, to make new fair laws.

lender.name: Meinaart
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to improve their lives and stimulate entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I create online games and websites for big brands.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I know that loans can help people become more successful in their businesses and I want to help with that.
lender.occupational_info: I buy houses that need fixing up, repair them and then rent them out. I also do many crafts, including making soaps, lotions, lip balms, bath salts, candles, knitting, crocheting, making hamacas, etc.

lender.name: Renée
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people and help them to achieve their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: To teach people love!

lender.name: Hollie
lender.loan_because: Kiva enables people to help themselves.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: money needs to be circulated.

lender.name: Dave and Karen
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I provide money for people to buy houses.

lender.name: Stig
lender.loan_because: When supporting common charity organizations, your gift will not always reach the people it was intended for. Thanks to Kiva, I can direct my support to named people/groups I judge to be trustable and give them "help to self help". Since it is a borrow-repay system, my initial support money hopefully can be "recycled" as new loans.

lender.name: Ian and Lily Rose
lender.loan_because: We want to help others that don't have as much as we have.
lender.occupational_info: We work everyday to learn what mom teaches us and to grow in our family's love.

lender.name: Barbara & Rick
lender.loan_because: We support the KIVA initiative as Christmas gifts - donations made to KIVA in honor of our friends at Christmas time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a choral director and my husband is a manager of a major information technology company.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in the world....
lender.occupational_info: I lead a worldwide purchasing team for a Fortune 500 company in the US

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: the help that we received made a big difference to our lives, and now we can help too.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to need little, and others have little, except the will to succeed.

lender.name: Kym
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream and a strong drive to achieve. In my case, I applied for funding and was told I met every criteria, except there were no resources to help me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach healthcare software to clinicians in the military and private sector.

lender.name: Taryn
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to really need money, and I know how much a loan from friends can mean.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers play nice together.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: thanks to help I've received, I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hunger relief charity.

lender.name: Haworth
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone that has a GOOD DREAM should have a GOOD CHANCE at realizing that dream.

lender.name: Miata
lender.loan_because: I love helping people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students all over the world wanting to achieve their educational goals through test prep

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of this organization! I've been to several developing nations and I want to be part of building financial stability for families.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to travel all around the world and I see tremendous value in local entrepreneurs. Good Luck with your dreams!
lender.occupational_info: brand marketing for an international company

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help even the economic playing field around the workd.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university.

lender.name: Krunzy.com
lender.loan_because:
At Krunzy.com we respect the work Kiva is doing. It is because of this we lend and participate.
We balance real life and gaming life and this is proof.
lender.occupational_info: Gaming website

lender.name: Jere
lender.loan_because: We should all be helping each other along in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I ask people to help other people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it's an incredibly easy way to empower people and do some good in the world.

lender.name: malgorzata
lender.loan_because: Because I am able to.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I want to empower those who do not have the means to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I work for a promotional products company, but I returned to school in September to qualify for a Masters in Social Work program. My ultimate goal is to get into disaster relief mental health.

lender.name: Cecilie
lender.loan_because: I think that if you have the chance to help someone, you should.. Just as a lot of people has helped me before, when I needed it.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I believe in having a dream. If someone has one, why not help make it happen?!
lender.occupational_info: Independent consultant who works in the banking / payments industry. Very interested in emerging micro-banking / technology - particularly that which is smart card / emerging technology enabled.

lender.name: Edie and Denny
lender.loan_because: We are Christian anti-hunger activists who feel called to end hunger and extreme poverty in our time.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping those around the world who have a passion for their trade and their families. As an entrepreneur myself, with those same goals, it brings me great joy to help those I would normally never come in contact with.
lender.occupational_info: As a designer, I provide companies with logos, brochures, packaging, web sites and invitations.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I believe in the value of a helping hand on a person-to-person basis
lender.occupational_info: my job enables me to help people connect with other cultures

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to exercise charitable giving because it empowers people and puts them on a path towards self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info:
I previously worked with Republican political candidates at all levels, helping them win election to public office and helping to shape them to be responsible and successful public servants.
Currently I work as a consultant to various individuals and organizations.
I'm also a part time law school student.

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I hope someone would do the same for me in the same situation
lender.occupational_info: Managing 22 gas stations in British Columbia, Canada

lender.name: mikeyames
lender.loan_because: I believe in Justice. I think microfinance helps the world to operate in the way the world is intended to work.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories for people who are helping others. I tell the story well and raise money so that the people who are helping others can continue.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have the basic necessities that so many lack. I want to help give others opportunity to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an engineering company helping to acquire land for projects to be built on, such as electrical transmission lines and roads.

lender.name: Caren
lender.loan_because: I received Kiva as a gift and find it a wonderful way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Gaiam: Founded in Boulder, Colorado in 1988, Gaiam is a provider of information, goods and services to customers who value the environment, a sustainable economy, healthy lifestyles, alternative healthcare and personal development.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: We all should

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: hard work, ambition and awareness of local (or global) desires and demands should be given the opportunity to build, wherever it occurs. And because local, home grown businesses are the most sustainable.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I loan because I understand how challenging life can be. I have been self-employed myself. Had I had this opportunity, I think it may have been easier.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large satellite entertainment company. I talk on the phone and help customers with technical and financial challenges.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have had the opportunity to work my way up from nothing; I've traveled extensively in Central and South America, and I'd like to help some of the people I met.
lender.occupational_info: I design systems for buildings; heating, cooling, electrical

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: With many giving little we can do so much.
lender.occupational_info: I work with many other people to find new medicines that will treat cancer.

lender.name: EDGARDO MORAN
lender.loan_because: I want to create an opportunity for people in need to become the writers of their own destiny, and as a way to give back to life for what life has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I supply the Federal Government with Technology and Support.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.occupational_info: I take articles written by doctors and rewrite them to make them easier to understand.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my kids to think globally and remember their blessings.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I live in a developing country and I see people struggling every day to manage their small businesses and make ends meet. The small things you can do for these people can make a big difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a software development center in Costa Rica, test software and sell application development services to US clients. But in my free time I can be found in the rainforest communities of rural Costa Rica hanging out with the locals or watching monkeys and toucans in the rainforest.

lender.name: Kakee
lender.loan_because: I've slowed down my Christmas gift giving because I think we all have more than we need here at home, and well intended gifts tend to join piles of useless excess. I put the gift money into loans for people who can really use it, and everyone feels good about that! While old gifts get put in the back of closets, Kiva loans can be repaid and reloaned many times to many people.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the open heart surgery team

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: It' s one way to do my part in helping others
lender.occupational_info: I build websites, paint pictures and draw comics. I also have 2 podcasts (like a tiny radio show on the Internet).

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Microfinance has been shown to work.

lender.name: Kiva B.
lender.loan_because: People need it.
lender.occupational_info: In Canada, I go to school from 9 to 3:30 every weekday. In school, I like to do art and to read and write.

lender.name: Glenn Watkins
lender.loan_because: Connecting and empowering people around the world makes a difference to all of our lives.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur and Chief Executive of inVenturez - strategy execution using community, technology, online.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I give because I can. I have been blessed with health, family and friends. Working in health care has taught me that there is no time like today to start making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the intensive care unit of a hospital. I take care of the sickest patients in the hospital and have been doing this for 30 years. I love helping people get well and learn about health.

lender.name: Roxanne, Dave & Kennedy
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help.

lender.name: yvette and matt
lender.loan_because: we are suppose to help others

lender.name: Shana
lender.loan_because: I care, I can, it makes the world a little smaller, and because we're supposed to help each other out, and take care of each other. :) So many have helped me financially - how can I not help someone else? :) Thank you Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: Receptionist

lender.name: Padric
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to give back some of my fortunes in life to those that are willing to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides housing to low income seniors in Edmonton. We provide housing to people that deserve a better quality of life than they can afford which allows them to have dignity as they age within our community.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. A little to me is a lot to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I give customer assistance to sm business owners w/credit cards.
